reviews.customers_say: Customers find the top looks nice. However, the quality receives mixed feedback, with several customers describing it as cheaply made. Additionally, customers have concerns about the sleeves, with one mentioning that the long sleeve piece was not included.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like
items.body: No es de la mejor calidad pero para mi Dizfraz quedó super It arrived well, the size is correct, the quality is in line with the price! I bought it for a costume and it was very satisfactory. Read more
items.author: Luz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: I only wore the top jacket thing but loved it Read more
items.author: Carina Baez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute cover up
items.body: The cover up is cute— the top is cheap Read more
items.author: Key Spencer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Low Quality with High Price Tag
items.body: This set is super cute, but I wouldn’t imagine paying more than $10 for it. Extremely low quality material. Read more
items.author: Natty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black mini crop fur sweater
items.body: Just like pictured. The buttons allow the fur to get taken off to wash. I’m happy with purchase. It was perfect it arrived better then I expected shipping was fast i highly recommend this seller Read more
items.author: Shirley

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Really poorly made
items.body: Sleeves and collar aren’t even attached, this is horribly made, will be returning… not worth, do not buy. You’d think they could at least see the sleeves and collar trim on, looks 100% worse than the photo in person because of this and move slightly while wearing it and you see the gapping by where they skimped on production costs. Don’t buy unless you want to sew the sleeves and collar on yourself.. Read more
items.author: Haley

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars cheap product
items.body: looks nice but fits weird. all the stiches was coming out,did not like it, very cheap made,returned it Read more
items.author: superbebek

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buy elsewhere
items.body: If this had been $15 max, I’d be fine with it. But for $40…? I only bought it for the fur sweater, and I knew the trim was only connected by buttons, but it does not feel secure at all. The top that came with it is paper thin and feels bad. Will never wear it. The sweater itself is kinda rough, tight, and a little odd fitting. Maybe size up? I’m very likely to return this. Disappointed Read more
items.author: Sarah Courts

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
